subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Diego Forlán was awarded the Golden Ball as the World Cup’s best player, and Germany forward Thomas Müller won the Golden Boot as the tournament’s top scorer.
snippet: Uruguay striker Diego Forlán was awarded the Golden Ball as the World Cup’s best player, and Germany forward Thomas Müller won the Golden Boot as the tournament’s top scorer.
